channel.title: Tor Browser Updater (Whonix) broken
channel.description:
[html]

Currently broken due to changes by torproject.org. You have to manually update Tor Browser in meanwhile: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Special:AWCforum/st/id262/updating_TOR_browser_error…html

Forum help thread: [[Special:AWCforum/st/id262/updating_TOR_browser_error…html]]

Already fixed in git. Due to lack of a release manager and testers it will take some time until we can push an update.

[/html]
